    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs=""
>
[Wand of Spiritual Warfare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1247)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 11</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Due to their connection to the shop’s proprietor, all Pathfinder Society agents have access to the items from Barghest’s Bin_

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wand juts from an ornate hilt like a short, wooden dagger blade.

<document level="2" id="action-1005" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _spiritual weapon_ of the appropriate level.

</column>
